question.content: Consumer confidence rose in April to the highest level in four years ………the increase in prices at the gas pump, according to the economic data.
South Korea is ………dependent on imports for its oil supply, making it the fourth largest oil importer in the world.
To expedite the processing of your loan application, send the requested information at your earliest ………
The researchers have experimented with the materials to test their durability and ………to temperature changes.
………business owners and managers think retention of good employees is based on compensation issues such as wage, salary levels and incentives.
………who are interested in touring the new plant should come to the lobby at noon.
Consumer rights groups argue that individuals should play a more direct role in ………the costs of their own health care.
This catalog provides ……… information about the materials including their publishers, main contents, languages used, price, and contact information.
The auto company said that its fourth quarter earnings fell ………12% in part because of the production disruption caused by the union’s strike.
